text: The 1975 Prize of Moscow News was the tenth edition of an international figure skating competition organized in Moscow, Soviet Union. It was held November 26–30, 1975. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating and ice dancing. ==Men== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name !
